1.演者の初期配置
2.演出開始

Mage Eratoma: Please look, Your Majesty! The dragon that
will finally defeat Fotizona has been completed!

Mage Eratoma: There is still room for improvement, but it
has enough power to burn away enemies at sea!

King Tarasa: Well done. Now, how do we control this
monster?

Mage Eratoma: Currently, it is in a dormant state. Once it
wakes up, it will fly straight into the sea and crush the
enemies!

King Tarasa: But won't our army also suffer damage from
that?!

Mage Eratoma: Even if we leave them alone, these soldiers
will die. We need corpses for the next dragon, it's only
logical.

Mage Eratoma: This is the crucial moment! We will create
the next dragon, and the dragon after that!

King Tarasa: You are possessed by a demon, restrain this
person.
kingdomMember_down
kingdomMember_down

King Tarasa: Leave the operation of the dragon to the other
mages! I may have ordered the creation of a monster, but I
did not command anyone to become a monster.

Mage Eratoma: P-Please wait! Just let me show you the sight
of the dragon soaring and dancing in the sky!
Mage Eratoma: For that reason, I...

???: O small sun of Sol... Destroy the minions of the
dancing demon in the sky.

King Tarasa: W-What on earth is happening?! Bring the
guards, it might be Fotizona's attack!

Bard: I can't believe I'm meeting a dragon in this era.
What a surprise!

Bard: Well, now that I'm done with my business, I'll be
heading back.
Mage Eratoma: ...Wait.

Mage Eratoma: Wait! You there! Don't you dare defile my
masterpiece, you wretched scoundrel!

Bard: I don't want to interfere too much, but since I've
found it, I have no choice but to erase it.
Bard: Sorry, but can you give up?
King Tarasa's Guard: ...Hah! Restrain that man, hurry!

King Tarasa: Ah... It's gone... It has disappeared...
Everything is over... Tarasa too... is fading away...

Looking at the results, Tarasa was not taken over by
Fotizona. Agnos, the leader of Tarasa's conquest, died
suddenly. Along with that, a peace treaty was swiftly
concluded with Queen Caron.

However, Tarasa suffered greater damage than in the First
Tarasa War and had to experience the humiliation of ceding
some territories. King Tarasa's lack of leadership was
criticized, leading to significant internal turmoil within
the country.

Amidst the concerns of many about Tarasa's future, Eratoma
had a completely different thought. They were thinking about
continuing their research on dragons... and wondering if
there was a way to do so.

Eratoma took advantage of the internal turmoil and defected
to Fotizona, taking with them all the research achievements
related to dragons as a parting gift.
イベント終了用
dobby_dispchara clear
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
